title: Dexter Revival and Retrospective | Reel Talk Podcast
author: Reel Talk
comment: I love and miss this show so much! Was so disappointed how it ended hopefully this revival will make sense, And the show runners can redeem themselves‼️‼️‼️‼️
Just what Television needs right now!!! 😎🍿
description:
Dexter is coming back for season 9, but it is only going to be a limited series of ten episodes. On top of that, we know that Dexter himself, Michael C. Hall, is coming back along with the original series showrunner. From what the pair have told us, it looks like they are attempting the right the wrong done with the first series finale by giving fans an ending they can really enjoy. Let's discuss!

Charlotte:
